unit.utterance: Inke aval yek fardi ruye deraxt bud dāšt mive mičid
unit.utterance_translation: At the beginning there was a man on a tree picking fruits

unit.utterance: hālā nemidānam yek šaxse digari bud šāyad pesaraš bud yā hamkāraš bud āmad ke mivehā rā bebarad
unit.utterance_translation: and there came another person who I'm not sure whether was his son or his colleague to take the fruits

unit.utterance: tuye rāh bexatere yek havasparti dočarxeaš mixorad be yek sangi ke mivehāyi ke dāšt mibord be harjāyi hālā barāye foruš yā har čize digari
unit.utterance_translation: on his way he got distracted and his bike hit a stone, all the fruits which he was carrying in order to sell maybe

unit.utterance: mixorad zamin va mivehā paxš mišavad ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: he fell down and all the fruits spilled out

unit.utterance: bad čand nafar az dustānaš yā ānhāyi ke ānhā ham tuye ān mohavate kār mikardand āmadand beheš komak kardand
unit.utterance_translation: then a few boys who could be either his friends or workers came to help him

unit.utterance: va dar hāle harkat ke bud beheš kolāhaš rā ke didand ruye zamin ast beheš bargardāndand
unit.utterance_translation: when he was about to leave, they gave him back his hat which was on the ground

unit.utterance: darezāye ān kār fekr mikonam ke ānhā čandtā az mivehā rā bardāštand ke be rāhe xodešān edāme dahand
unit.utterance_translation: instead they took some fruits and went away

unit.utterance: dar rāhe bargašt hālā mivehāyi ke dastešān bud ān šaxsi ke ruye deraxt bud dāšt kār mikard
unit.utterance_translation: on their way back, the man who was on the tree saw the fruits in their hands

unit.utterance: be gomāne inke āyā dozd bud yā har čize digari be dastešān negāh kard taajob kard va ānhā ham rad šodand va raftand
unit.utterance_translation: while he was wondering whether they had stolen the fruits or not surprisingly, the boys passed him by and went away.
